Package src.java.index

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IndexReader
    An entity that reads an InvertedIndex from disk with a format depending on the implementation.
    IndexWriter
    An entity that writes an InvertedIndex on disk with a format depending on the implementation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CSVIndexReader
    This implementation of IndexReader reads an InvertedIndex object from the disk, with a format similar to CSV.
    Example: term, documentId:DocumentFrequency,documentId:DocumentFrequency, ...
    CSVIndexWriter
    This implementation of IndexWriter writes an InvertedIndex object on disk, with a format similar to CSV.
    Example: term, documentId:DocumentFrequency,documentId:DocumentFrequency, ...
    Index
    The base class for an index that maps an id to a Vector
    InvertedIndex
    A data structure that represents an invertedIndex that stores how many times a term appears in each file along with the document id.
    Posting
    This class represents an entry on the invertedIndex, it has representative purposes.
